files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Config.IAstraRpgHealthConfig
files.Summary: Interface for health system configuration. This allows for dependency injection and easier testing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyBarrierStep
files.Summary: Damage step that consumes target barrier (temporary shields). It doesn't remove health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyCriticalMultiplierStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies critical hit multipliers when the current damage is flagged as critical.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyDefenseStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies defensive calculations based on the damage type's defensive and piercing stats and configured reduction functions.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyDmgModifiersStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies generic and configured damage source/type modifiers (for example weaknesses and resistances) to the current damage amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageCalculationStrategy
files.Summary: ScriptableObject that defines a configurable damage calculation pipeline. The pipeline is composed of ordered instances executed sequentially.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageInfo
files.Summary: Container for damage pipeline state while a damage calculation is executed. Holds the amounts being transformed, the source/type metadata and accumulated prevention reasons.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageStep
files.Summary: Base class for a single step in the damage calculation pipeline. A performs a focused transformation on a instance (for example applying defenses, barriers or modifiers).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageAmountInfo.StepAmountRecord
files.Summary: Immutable record representing the damage value before and after a single pipeline phase (identified by the phase type).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageAmountInfo
files.Summary: Holds numeric details related to an attempt to apply damage, allowing intermediate values to be recorded for each phase of the calculation pipeline (e.g. reductions, resistances, absorptions).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageOutcome
files.Summary: The overall result of attempting to apply damage to a target. Use this in to indicate whether any damage was applied or if the attempt was prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamagePreventionReason
files.Summary: Flags that explain why a damage attempt was prevented. Multiple reasons may be combined. These flags are used in when an attempt is prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamagePreventionReasonExtensions
files.Summary: Extension helpers for .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageResolution
files.Summary: The result returned by damage application attempts. Encapsulates whether the damage was applied or prevented, the reasons for prevention, and the concrete damage information that was ultimately applied (if any).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageSource
files.Summary: Defines a damage source asset that identifies how damage was produced (for example: a spell, trap, environmental hazard, system event, etc.). Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Damage Source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageType
files.Summary: Scriptable asset that describes a damage category (for example: Physical, Fire, Poison). A DamageType declares which stat reduces this damage, which reduction functions to use, whether a stat pierces its defensive stats and whether it ignores barriers. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / DamageType.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.IDamageable
files.Summary: Implemented by entities that can receive damage. The method accepts a record describing a pending damage attempt and returns a describing whether the damage was applied or prevented and additional details.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoAmount
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoDealer
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the dealer entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoSource
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoTarget
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the target entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoType
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage type.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.PreDamageInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete step builder implementing the fluent interfaces. After setting required fields, optional flags (critical, multiplier) can be configured before calling .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo
files.Summary: Immutable container representing damage information before it is applied. Use to construct instances using the fluent step builder.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DamageReductionFunctions.DamageReductionFn
files.Summary: Base type for damage reduction functions. Implementations compute how an incoming damage amount is reduced using a defensive statistic value.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DestroyOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that destroys the entity's when it dies. This is provided as a ScriptableObject to be reused across entities. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Destroy.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DisableOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that disables the entity's when it dies. This is useful for entities that should be hidden but not destroyed, allowing for resurrection. Pairs well with EnableOnResurrectionStrategy to re-enable the GameObject on resurrection. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Disable.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DoNothingOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A no-op death strategy. Use this when no action is required upon an entity's death. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Do Nothing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.MultipleOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that executes multiple death strategies in order. This allows combining multiple death behaviors without creating new strategy classes. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Multiple.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.OnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: Base strategy type for handling an entity's death. Derive from this class and implement to define custom death behavior.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Base type for defense reduction functions. Implementations compute a reduced defense value based on a piercing stat and the pierced defense stat.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.FlatDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Reduces defense by subtracting a scaled amount of the piercing stat from the pierced defense. The result is clamped to the stat's min/max bounds. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Flat Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.LogDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Applies a logarithmic divisive reduction to defense to provide diminishing returns as piercing increases. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Log Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.PercentageDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Reduces defense by subtracting a percentage of the pierced defense equal to the piercing stat percentage. Example: piercingStatValue = 20 -> reduces defense by 20%. Create isntances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Log Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.EntityHealth
files.Summary: Manages the health, damage, and healing mechanics for an entity. Handles damage calculation, health regeneration, barriers (temporary HP), and death events.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.DamageResolutionGameEvent
files.Summary: Used to notify whether a damage was applied or prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.DamageResolutionGameEventListener
files.Summary: Used to notify whether a damage was applied or prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityDiedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityDiedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityGainedHealthGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity gained some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityGainedHealthGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity gained some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityHealedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity received an healing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityHealedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity received an healing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityLostHealthGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity lost some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityLostHealthGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity lost some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityMaxHealthChangedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity whose Max HP changed, the new Max HP, and the old Max HP.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityMaxHealthChangedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity whose Max HP changed, the new Max HP, and the old Max HP.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityResurrectedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity resurrected with the specified amount of health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityResurrectedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity resurrected with the specified amount of health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.PreHealGameEvent
files.Summary: THe entity is about to be healed.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.PreHealGameEventListener
files.Summary: THe entity is about to be healed.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Exceptions.DeadEntityException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when attempting to perform health-modifying operations on a dead entity. This exception indicates a programming error where the caller attempted to heal, damage, or otherwise modify the health of an entity that has already died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Experience.ExpCollector
files.Summary: Collects experience when this entity deals killing blows. Requires an on the GameObject.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.HealAmountInfo
files.Summary: Represents the different numeric stages of a heal amount as it is processed: the raw requested amount, the amount after applying a heal modifier, and the final net amount applied.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.HealSource
files.Summary: Defines a heal source asset that identifies how a heal was produced (e.g. spell, potion, resurrection, system, ...). Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Heal Source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.IHealable
files.Summary: Interface for entities that can receive healing. Implementers apply healing based on the provided .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealAmountSelector
files.Summary: Selects which damage amount will be used as the basis for lifesteal calculations.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealBasisMode
files.Summary: Specifies which damage value should be used as the basis for lifesteal calculations.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealConfig
files.Summary: ScriptableObject for configuring lifesteal mappings for different damage types.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealStatConfig
files.Summary: Configuration that associates a lifesteal Stat and HealSource with an optional amount selector.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoAmount
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the heal amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoHealer
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the healer entity and optional extras.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoSource
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the heal source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.PreHealInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete builder implementing the fluent step interfaces to construct a .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo
files.Summary: Immutable description of a pending heal operation that can be passed through heal processing logic before the actual health change is applied.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoAmount
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the heal amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoHealer
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the healer entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoSource
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the heal source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoTarget
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the target entity and finalize options.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.ReceivedHealInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete fluent builder used to assemble a . Use to start.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo
files.Summary: Represents the result of a heal operation as actually received by the target. Contains the resolved heal amount, source, involved entities and whether it was critical.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.StepValuePoint
files.Summary: Selects whether to use the pre-step or post-step value when is selected.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.DoNothingOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A no-op resurrection strategy. Use this when no action is required upon an entity's resurrection. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Do Nothing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.EnableOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A resurrection strategy that enables the entity's when it is resurrected. This is useful when using a death strategy that disables the GameObject (e.g., DisableOnDeathStrategy). Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Enable.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.MultipleOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A resurrection strategy that executes multiple resurrection strategies in order. This allows combining multiple resurrection behaviors without creating new strategy classes. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Multiple.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.OnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: Base strategy type for handling an entity's resurrection. Derive from this class and implement to define custom resurrection behavior.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.ResurrectionInfo
files.Summary: Contains information about an entity resurrection event.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Scaling.ScalingComponents.HealthScalingComponent
files.Summary: A scaling component that calculates a value based on an entity's health values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Scaling.ScalingComponents.HealthScalingComponentMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a HealthScalingComponent asset.
